content:
Sure, here are the main points about the bulk edit feature:

* Bulk edit feature allows users to select multiple Artifact CIs
* Users can assign the same promotion workflow to all selected Artifact CIs at once
* Selection mechanism, such as checkboxes, is used to choose the Artifact CIs to edit
* Once selected, users can choose the promotion workflow to assign to the selected Artifact CIs
* This feature saves time and reduces the tedious and time-consuming task of editing each Artifact CI manually
* Users can quickly and easily assign promotion workflows to multiple Artifact CIs at once.
